name: Snow
uniques: Occurs at temperature between [-1] and [-0.6] and humidity between [0] and [1]

Occurs at temperature between [-0.5] and [-0.4] and humidity between [0] and [0.6]

A Region is formed with at least [25]% [Snow] tiles, with priority [4]

Every [17] tiles with this terrain will receive a major deposit of a strategic resource.
